thoughts.text: I think it would be useful to get a summary of a text from a website.
thoughts.reasoning: Getting a summary of a text can help me quickly understand its main points and decide if it is relevant to my task.
thoughts.plan:
- Use the 'get_text_summary' command to visit a website and get a summary of its text.
- Specify a URL and a question to summarize the text.
- Use a text summarization algorithm to generate a summary of the text.
- Output the summary to the user.
